text: Allahale kasaila'i usako saktibhanda badhi kasta didaina. Juna sukarya usale gardacha tyasako pratiphala pa'umcha ra jo papa karma gardacha tyasako parinama bhogne cha. He hamro pratipalaka! Yadi hamibata kunai bhula va truti bha'eko bha'e hamila'i dosi na thahara'unu. He palanakarta! Hamimathi tyasto bhari narakhnu jasto ki timile hamibhanda agadika manisaharumathi rakheka thiyau. He hamro pratipalaka! Juna bhari bokna sakne ksamata hamima chaina tyasto bhari hamimathi narakhnu ra (he hamro pratipalaka!) Hamra bhulatrutiko nimitta hamila'i ksama gara ra mukti pradana gara ra hamimathi daya gara, timi nai hamro svami hau tasartha hamila'i kaphiraharumathi vijaya pradana gara
